concept.title: Royal icing consistencies
concept.shortdesc: Icing used for flooding requires a very unique consistency, while icing used for other techniques should have a toothpaste-like consistency. Icing consistency is the key to decorating success.

conbody.p: Icing used for flooding should have a consistency that is thin enough to flow into itself but thick enough that it doesn't drip off the cookie.
Icing used for decorating should be a bit thicker than icing used for flooding. Decorating icing has an ideal consistency that matches toothpaste.
